name: unaffecting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not causing a strong emotion, especially sadness: Watching the play is a disappointingly unaffecting experience. The special effects are unaffecting despite all of the money that appears to have been spent on them. Opposite
affecting
More examplesFewer examplesMany of the films being produced these days are dull and unaffecting. The tragedy that lies at heart of the film is oddly unaffecting.Her performance as Desdemona provides the one bright spot in an otherwise unaffecting production.This new show is highly watchable but completely unaffecting.
